name: Fire Ball Breaker Glow
description:
Fire Ball Breaker Glow is an addictive free game with cute graphics and music that includes many items, such as multiball, expand paddle, fire ball,gun and much more!
Enjoy various missions and addictively simple play control.
FEATURES
Exciting bounce ball effect and graphics.
Fireball ball shooter to Override all Bricks for crash breakout
Hundred of levels designed
If you ready, let enjoy break bricks game!
